data.author: Von R. Glitschka
data.quote: We have a powerful iPhone calendar app on our hands here – meetings, locations, notes, tasks…everything under one roof.

data.author: Frank Capra
data.quote: When it comes to combining both tasks lists and calendar events into one, the Plancy app currently does it best.

data.author: Steven Heller
data.quote: Plancy gets close to being my ideal iPhone calendar app for the current state of calendar and reminders clients.
